name: LIPLINER ON THE PIPELINER (HOLLY)
text:
Employees lied to there leadership....said i was being rude..expected me to be psychic. Drivers
..when u go...use your recording devices like i did. So you can prove who was rude

name: Darryl Floyd
text: Very pleasant! I was cared for by staff very speedly and professional.

name: Renea Obryan
text: Great Company to work with. Our service Representative Derek is so nice and helpful, an asset to the Company. Great experience all around from Sales to Service. We love our rugs!!

name: Jr 5 Mcmillian
text: Thomas Truck Lines, Inc. experience over the years with UniFirst and more especially their representative, Danny, that comes by every week to service our office and shop has been as good as it gets.  Danny is an asset to UniFirst in the highest degree.  He is always upbeat and pleasant.  He is professional and is willing to take the time to answer any questions that we might have.  Highly recommend UniFirst and Danny to any one thinking of using a uniform service.

name: Renea Green
text: Williams Paint And Body Shop from Marianna, Fl here! We LOVE Derek Watkins! He is always in a good mood and upbeat. When we have questions or concerns he is on top of it getting it handled, no problem. 10/10 best there is! He is a great asset to UniFirst Uniform Services.

name: Whitewater Environmental
text: Absolutely the best customer service representative (Derek) on our route! He makes sure we have everything we need and communicates all schedule changes in advance. Loves that he brings In the catalogs for opportunities to buy merchandise too.

name: Sharon Lampley
text: I work here , started yesterday. Love It 💕

name: Dajun Godwin
text: My name is Dajun Godwin and I am one of the Route Service Managers here at UniFirst in Dothan, Al. It has been a pleasure to work with this company for the past nine years and I look forward to many more! UniFirst, not only in Dothan, but company wide, is a generous company who not only looks after their customers, but their employees needs and desires. UniFirst is a great company to work for with great benefits and provides so many with the opportunities for growth within the company. I would recommend UniFirst as not just a company that will give you a great job, but a company you can grow in and build a career in!

name: Lillie Gilbert
text: This is Jackson county road and bridge Derek is so awesome I love working with him, he is a super nice guy. I appreciate how he communicate with me about the uniform's. It's always good to see him on Thursday ☺️

name: Cathy Daughtry
text:
Chris is always so helpful and eager to help us anyway he can. Always comes in with a smile.
Thanks for keeping our guys uniform ready.  We appreciate all you do for us,  Chris.    ~Cathy, with ADS Security- Dothan, Al.~

name: Londa Rambeau
text: Mr. Danny always does an AMAZING job! Everyone here at (Georgia Gulf Sulfur) really appreciate his time and effort. Thank you!

name: Myra Johnson
text: Derek Watkins is always very friendly, courteous & helpful. He always helps with whatever we need and always has a smile on his face.  Great customer service representative for your company.

name: Donta Wade
text: Mr. Danny is amazing! Always on time and great customer service! will recommend him and UniFirst to anyone. Signed THE TOWN OF GORDON, ALABAMA.

name: Connie Adams
text: I am an employee of XPO Logistics and Michael Lingo is our route driver.   He is always so helpful, courteous and pleasant.  He always goes about his work with a smile on his face.   He is a wonderful representation of your company and you should be proud to have him as an employee!

name: Quetta Johnson
text: Derek comes to Cobbs and he is a great guy very respectable! Does his job well! Always asking what he can do to help more or make things better!

name: Regina Lacaze
text: Exceeds our expectations! Service is wonderful, friendly and fast! Always goes the extra mile to make sure you are 100% satisfied!

name: BJs Grill
text: This is Jennifer, owner of BJs Grill in Chipley, FL.  We have the most amazing route driver, Derek! He always goes above and beyond to make sure we have everything we need at our restaurant! He is always a pleasure to see each week and takes his time to get to know his customers!! He is a definite asset!! 😁

name: Felicia Bowick
text: My name is Felicia Bowick Manger at a Convenient Store and Michael Lingo work my store and I must say he gives great customer service 😀 I be satisfied every time never skip a beat Keep up the good work  Michael 👍

name: cheryl davidson
text: Derek is knowledgeable and always professional and polite! He is a pleasure to do business with here at Washington County BOCC.

name: Leonard Redmon
text: This Skeeter from Finish Line Automotive, our route guy Derek, is great. He's always thorough and very helpful.

name: Stefanie Drummond
text: I work for Kraton Chemical in Marianna and we have the BEST SERVICE thanks to Derek!!  He's always super friendly and helpful!!

name: Derek Watkins
text: I work here as an RSR and I love working and servicing our customers! Great place to work and great place to get a opportunity to meet new people!

name: Steve Bond
text: I'm Steve" Cowboy" Bond counter team leader at Mayer Electric Supply in Dothan Alabama, We use unifirst mainly because of the friendly service I receive from my route driver Michael Lingo...No one we get service from is as spot on in all categories as Michael. Great asset for unifirst....

name: Anthony Wade
text: This is Aaron at William's Bros trucking and our route guy Derek is awesome! He always fixes any uniforms that needs to be repaired! Friendly as well

name: Wayne Morris
text: I own and operate Morris Auto Parts in Ashford Alabama and have had the privilege of doing business with Mr. Danny Pope for 17 years now. He is always professional and courteous and is an outstanding representative that Unifirst should be proud to have on their team.

name: Jeremie Locke
text: O’Reilly’s in Marianna unifirst driver Derek is awesome and has great attitude. And always does great job thank you Derek...

name: Ryan Frye
text: Our route guy Derek here at Hungry Howies Blountstown is always reliable and never leaves us hanging!

name: Amanda Marchant
text: I am with Gulf Coast Truck & Equipment and Michael Lingo is our route guy- GREAT customer service from him ! He always makes sure we have what we need and never any issues.

name: Debra Ruffin
text: I am the manager at EEC. Our delivery man is very nice and work well with the staff. Keep up the good job. Thanks

name: Kris Dixon
text: Kris and Jeff here from Billy Lawrence GMC in Abbeville, Al. Billy Martin is our route man and we can't say enough about him. Always friendly, courteous and gets the job done. Thank you Billy!

name: Barbara Dillon
text: Chris is ALWAYS cheerful and quick to help with anything we need.  So glad he is our UniFirst delivery guy!

name: gabbi emory
text: this is gabbi from Dq I’m a shift manager here. Derek is amazing he always makes sure we have everything we need for the week🤗

name: chris48883
text: Michael is doing a awesome job . Cindy at Mike Smith's Automotive Collision

name: Paula Kirk
text: Mr. Danny is a great person an very great at his job. I recommend anyone that is needing uniforms or any supplies should call Danny atUnifirst. Thanks again Danny for everything    Paula Kirk @ DK Diesel & Tire LLC & DK Trucking & Logging LLC.

name: Alex Peters
text: This is Christy with Western Star of Dothan. We have used Unifirst for 20+ years and have received nothing but amazing service. Dajun and Courtney have been great and I would highly recommend!!

name: Barbi Noreika
text: This is Skins and Bubba and Derek our route guy is awesome and always takes care of us!

name: Jeffrey Johnson
text: This is jeffrey from the jackson county community developement we just wanted to share our appreciation for unifirst especially derek he is very professional and always super nice.

name: April Barrick
text: I am an employee with Houston County Road and Bridge Dept. and Michael is over our uniform route.  I can say he is the best we have ever had!  He is nice and friendly and takes care of any of our needs that might come up with our uniforms.   He always has a smile on his face and I love talking with him when he comes.

name: Nichole Townsell
text:
This is Performance Peterbilt in Cottondale,Fl
Our service guy is Dereck
Awesome guy and very friendly

name: Bishop Farms
text: This is Bishop Farms and Derek is our rep -  he does a great job!

name: Denise Brown
text:
Daniel Grantham is our service guy..
he does a great job for us, taking care of concerns we may have.

IAM Local Lodge 2003 - contract# 668835

name: JACKSON HONDA
text:
UniFirst has been an exceptional company while catering to our needs. Courtney visits weekly and is always such a joy. We all look forward to seeing her.  She presents a professional demeanor while remaining very personable. Prior to Courtney taking over our route, Dajun was our A-1! It is always a great surprise when he subs our route. We could not ask for better customer service than that provided by both Courtney and Dajun! Both are the epitome of excellent customer service.

-Jackson Honda & Used Cars, Andalusia, AL

name: Kim Hutchinson
text: I think I can speak for my entire department at Gulf Coast Truck , when I say we think very highly of Michael Lingo.   Michael is extremely dependable, professional and friendly.   His sunny disposition always puts a smile on our faces, he is such a joy to work with.

name: Carmeshia Walker
text: Great company, great managers, and just all around great place to work.

name: kecia Davis
text: I am the owner of Mia’s Italian Restaurant here in Dothan. Have done business  for 22 years with them. Absolutely love my driver Michael Lingo. He is a great guy and always there when I need him

name: Donna Kay Anderson
text: We use Unifirst for our employee uniforms and have been very pleased with their services.  Great staff, especially Xavier!  He is always friendly and is a great representative for the company.

name: Nicole Bradley
text: The Jackson County BOCC has used UniFirst for the last several years. Derek became our driver in 2020 and has been very attentive and helpful to us as a customer with a wide variety of departments and locations as well as a chaotic period of time in which our main building was inaccessible to the public and required him going out of his way to use our back doors and even detours within the building.

name: Beau Gibson
text: We receive A+ product and customer service here at Covington Heavy Duty parts from UniFirst. Lingo is the best route man we could ask for. Highly recommended for businesses locally.

name: Dawn Anglin
text: We at Early County Public Works have the best service. Chris Lett helps me with any problems I have or any questions about our invoice. Couldn't ask for anyone better. He is always smiling and has a very good attitude.

name: James Bledsoe
text: Bledsoe Mining....our route guy, Michael, is the best! We certainly appreciate all that he does.  He is always helpful and has a great personality!  Thanks for all you do Michael!

name: Tina Sutton
text: Jcarc route guy is Derek. Great guy!

name: Andrea Carroll
text: The company I work for has been using Unifirst in Dothan for over a decade now and I'm responsible for coordinating/meeting with the route driver every week.  They are the best of the best and always make sure we are happy and well taken care of.  If you need a uniform service that consistently meets & exceeds your expectations, Unifirst in Dothan is who you call!

name: Rachel Meadows
text: We at Louisville Pecan Co. have used Unifirst for 10 years or more. Michael Lingo is our delivery driver and he is always polite and efficient. Michael gets A++ for friendly service.

name: Kathy Teipel
text: At Nutrien Ag Solutions we have been so pleased to have a company that cares so much about their Customers!  Chris Lett is awesome and so caring to make sure everyone is happy!  He always has a smile on his face and lets you know how much your business is appreciated!  Great job Chris!!!

name: Marcy Hill
text: Michael Lingo is our route man at SE Health for our Construction crew and we love him!!  Always smiling and in a great mood!  We love our route man!

name: christine white
text:
I would like first to say Thank You!
Michael Lingo is just such a friendly, courteous & helpful customer service provide.  Michael is always very informative and willing to work out any uniform issues, that our employees may have.  The SunSouth Samson Location is very happy with the professional, caring and helpfulness that he provides.   Looking forward to the months ahead in 2021

Thank you,
SunSouth Samson

name: robie moore
text: Mr.Godwin & Courtney are awesome 5 stars all the way

name: Will Mack
text: Our driver Courtney is the best of the best. Always prompt and a pleasure to work with. - Walt Massey Automotive

name: Virginia Miller
text: Love, Love, Love this company! I can honestly say its a pleasure to work here!!!

name: Le Adams
text:
Michael always helps us out when we need items out of his normal delivery route!
Thanks guys!
Lea @ Action

name: Susie Norsworthy
text:
Michael Lingo at Unifirst in Dothan is always there to help out with all your supply & uniform needs. He is always smiling ,courteous & helpful.
Great company with a wonderful staff.

name: April Williams
text: Michael our driver , he is great, he has been coming here for a long time , he is always so helpful if we need anything , he is very sweet and very outgoing, enjoy talking to him when he comes in, one of the type of people that you feel like you have known  forever-Thanks from Dixieland Metals !!!

name: Lisa Burkett
text: The guys are absolutely pleased with our current delivery guy, Michael Lingo.  Always up beat and very couterious.

text: My employer does business with UniFirst. Our  route driver Chris is awesome! He is very professional and efficient!

text: Xavier is great at his job, he takes care of our business (Gilland Ford) and i would like to see him have authorization to do even more within the company

text: We at the Inland of Newton & Ozark are customers of Unifirst. Xavier is our RSR. He always has an upbeat and positive attitude. He’s always on time and takes pride in his job.

text: I’ve been using them for our uniform needs at Gilland Chevrolet GMC for many years, always been happy with the service! Jason B. is a good leader and his team does a great job, especially our rep. Xavier! Thanks guys!!!

name: Valerie Brown
text: Our driver, Chris, is always informative, friendly and accurate on everything he does. Always has a smile on his face.  Billy Lawrence Chevrolet in Eufaula

name: Dothan Money Mizer
text: We have used Unifirst for several years and Michael has always been a pleasure.

name: Jill Hamm
text: Michael Lingo delivers uniforms to Wiregrass Construction in Headland Al. He does a great job!

text: Michael Lingo does a great job. Glad to have him service Truckworx in Dothan.

name: Andy Franklin
text: Chris does a great job for us at DHS.  Always comes in with a smile on his face and is always very professional and reliable.

name: Genifer Tolliver
text: We are very satisfied with UniFirst here at Faine elementary school! Great company and staff!

name: Debbie Turner
text: On behalf of Covington Casket, to say that Courtney and Dajun are the absolute best to work with is putting it mildly, they come highly recommended for any future endeavers, they are very polite and handles their job and customers with much respect. It is indeed a pleasure to work with them.

name: Sybil Lovering
text: Chris is on top if his game, he understands what is needed for my company and he delivers.

name: Rachel Shiver
text: I work at Durden Outdoor Displays and Michael Lingo is the UniFirst Rep that does our service and he is awesome!!!

name: Breanna Mayhall
text: Awesome Staff!! Courtney & Dajun are the best! -Covington Casket Staff

name: Paula Figgers
text: My employer Zaxby’s of Marianna does business with Unifirst. Our delivery guy Derek is efficient and on time.

name: Kimberly Brown
text: My company has done business with Unifirst for a while, Chris is always a delight when he comes in on our route! That’s always a plus!

name: WillieShanteena Williams
text: UNIFIRST has an variety of apparels, such as, work wear,coveralls, coats, jacket, Hi Vis T-shirts, pants, also, button downs, aprons bath Towels, hand towels,  Sanitizer.

name: R ll
text: This is the best place I have ever worked. I enjoy my job and the people I work with.

name: Pat Zorn
text:
We have been with Unifirst for 10 years and we have always had GREAT service. Jamey, our delivery driver, is outstanding...True Professional.
Samson Steel Truss.

name: Jim Ed Brown
text: I'm employed with Covington Cleaner & Equipment (DIVISION OF CHDP) in Andalusia, Al. We've only been open since Oct 2015. Once we first started getting our uniforms from UniFirst, I have to say, I have ZERO complaints with our service. We've had several changes that we asked in our initial fitting, from the pants size, to the shirts, and the style each person felt comfortable in. And each time a request was made, the next delivery (each week), our request was fulfilled, and with a smile on top of that.  If there's a business out there that has been searching for a great  uniform service, then look no further. THIS IS IT!!!

name: Antonio Caceres
text: jamie, our delivery guy here to our MAACO of Dothan location is by far, one of the most professional, hard working and honest individuals i have come across in the rental uniform field. Always on time, courteous and polite to all of our needs in the front office with our mats and our uniforms. Wished we had 4 of him working for us here!

name: Bonnie HCG
text: I am with the Henry Co Gin and Dajun is our UniFirst rep and he does an excellent job.  He is always cheerful and willing to hear any problems or concerns we may have, which is usually none or very small, and handles them immediately.   The workers know they can ask him questions about purchasing pants, shirts or jackets for themselves and he is very helpful in answering all their questions.  We are extremely pleased with the service we receive from UniFirst and Dajun.

name: Spenser Peters
text:
I own Spensers meat market in Dothan
Unifirst has provided me with great product and wonderful customer service over the years!
The drivers are very pleasant to deal with also!
I'd highly recommend them to anyone looking for services!

name: Jamie Croft
text: I work with Opp's Co-op in Opp, AL.  UniFirst of Dothan, AL provides us with great service.  Dejun is the best! He always makes sure we are pleased with the service and does what ever he can for us. Highly recommend UniFirst of Dothan!

name: Christi Peterson
text:
I am the owner of Ray's Restaurant. I would like to say that our delivery driver, Jamie is the best! And for him I give him 5 stars. He always makes sure that we have what we need and goes above and beyond to make sure that we get it. Thanks Jamie!

The reason that I am giving Uni1st an overall 3  stars is because we often have problems withour towels being full of lint. They also come torn or very worn also. We sometimes do not get a full bag, shorting us before our next delivery.  Our aprons that we receive often have half of the tie torn off. So we can't even tie them on. Also, they come very stained occasionally as if they have been mildewed and then laundered. The mildew stain is still there after the wash. We pay a fee each week for these items to be replaced as needed, but we rarely see new items in the
mix. We have also had problems with the posting of payments in a timely manner. Because the payments are not posted we then get a late charge added to the bill. It would be great if these small issues could get taken care of.

name: Tiffany Blackmon
text: The Dothan Housing Authority -Henry Green Central Office really enjoys the service that we receive from Uni First our delivery man: "Dajun" is very courteous, reliable, and efficient. GREAT JOB !!!

name: Alex Ethridge
text:
We are so pleased with our service from UniFirst here at Keystone Automotive! Having a clean environment is important to us when running a business and UniFirst gives us the resources to do so. Our friendly driver, Dajun Godwin, always shows up with our clean floor mats and soap with a smile on his face! He does everything for us! We couldn't be happier with this company!

Alex Ethridge
Dothan, Al.
Accountant

name: Daniel Draughon
text: Unifirst is our uniform provider at Tri - State Commercial Tire in Dothan, Alabama and our representative is Jamey Watkins. We could not be happier with the service we receive from them. Jamey is always on time and has a great attitude!

name: Amber Carpenter
text: I am Amber Carpenter with Jackson Honda and I recommend UniFirst out of Dothan AL to any company who is in the market for uniforms they provide great service. Great customer service!!!!

name: Gary Holloway
text: Southeast Gas has received great service from Unifirst for almost two years. Dajun Godwin is the best route man we have ever had with any service provider. We have been extremely pleased with our working relationship with unifirst and the service you provide. We look forward to many years of doing business with your company.

name: Sarah Jackson
text: We are very pleased with the reliable, friendly service we receive from Unifirst here at Holland Machine Shop.

name: Valarie Smith
text: CPS Headland- We receive The very best from Dajun at Unifirst!  Very pleased :)

name: Leona Garrett
text: Hi, I'm Lee Garrett at Carriage House Apartments and I am VERY pleased with the service I receive from Unifirst. Dajun Godwin always provides us with great customer service .

name: Greystone United Methodist Church
text: Unifirst of Dothan, Alabama is a great company. Dajun is an amazing employee that always delivers with a smile at Greystone United Methodist Church!

name: Kelee Shugart
text: I am Kelee with Dyna-Lift.  Unifirst services our company and does an incredible job!!  Absolutely love our RSR!!

name: David Dillard
text: I'M DAVID WITH TURF MAINTENANCE COMPANY IN DOTHAN AL.  I HAVE BEEN A UNIFIRST CUSTOMER FOR SEVERAL YEARS .  I REMAIN A CUSTOMER BECAUSE OF THE OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE I RECEIVE EACH WEEK. THANK YOU DAJUN FOR YOUR CONTINUED CUSTOMER SUPPORT.

name: Chris Bryson
text: Hi i'm Chris with Maaco Collision Repair and Auto Painting.  I have used Unifirst for several years now. Michael our driver has great attitude and great personallity.  He always has a smile on his face and is always on time.  Couldn't ask for a better person.

name: Debbie Rawls
text: I am employed with Covington Casket Co in Andalusia, AL and Dajun is our service guy and I would like to rate him as a 5 star service man, he is and has always serviced Covington Casket with great service and much respect.

name: john banks
text: Arnold's Automotive says UniFirst is a great company with great customer service!

name: Judy Perdue
text:
I have had Unifirst for five years and they are a great company to do business with!  They have worked with me to help me stay within my budget and they give me great service.  I have a regular representative, Dajon Godwin, but all of the subs and management are great guys.  They are always up with a smile, and they make me feel like they appreciate my business.  I would recommend Unifirst Uniform Company to anyone looking to rent uniforms and other items.

Sincerely,
Judy Perdue, Property Manager
Colony Square Apts.
Dothan, AL. 36301

name: Scotty Moulton
text:
Does a great job at a very good price for EDSCO Fasteners in Elba, Al. We are pleased with the service!

Scotty Moulton
General Manager

name: Jeannie Spooner
text: Western Star of Dothan has been doing business with Unifirst for over 25 years. Great service!!

name: Eric ONeill
text: Great Customer Service!!!!! Our delivery guy Jeff is AWESOME!!!!!!

name: Rachel Walton
text: Service as expected! Friendly route driver.

name: Project 97
text: I like Grainger and have never had a problem until now. I just tried to call the mobile location and they woman that answered the phone said that there is no way to be transferred to an exact store. If that is true that’s the craziest thing I’ve ever heard. I asked her so if you can’t transfer me to them, then just give me the number to them and I’ll call. Her response was the store doesn’t have a number. I asked, so there is absolutely no way possible to communicate or get in touch with anyone at that location? And she said that’s correct. It has been that way for years she said. It blew my mind. Truly the craziest thing I have heard in quite a while.

resp.text: Hi, Chris. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team can be reached at 1(800)472-4643 and are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. They have access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Stacy Upshaw
text: I was surprised at how good the customer service is over the telephone, very helpful looking up part numbers and the shipping was very fast

resp.text: We're very happy we could help, Stacy! Thank you for sharing this and thanks for choosing Grainger!

name: Rock
text:
Not open on Saturday but the Grainger website says it IS open. It is NOT open on Saturday. I just drove a freaking hour to come buy work boots.
Why not be open on Saturday anyway? We work monday-friday in the normal world when we'd go here.

name: Goddbod. Junya “iceberg” Winston
text: nice neighborhood..

name: Wes Allday
text: Nice selection in inventory, staff is helpful with finding/ordering needed parts. Prices can be a bit steep.

name: Doug Fleming
text: Why is this the only electrical supplier that WONT let you speak to a local store without jumping through hoops?

resp.text: Hi, Doug. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team is set up to assist our Customers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and has access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Tj Hamlet
text: hands down one of the best place to work .i enjoy working there the staff is nice and friendly and the business is wonderful. great management!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your review. We are working hard to server our employees and customers.

name: Nicolae Borta
text: Nice people,  empty in 25 min.

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We’ve been a customer for a few months now, we had a mechanic lose everything he owned and uniform he had in a tornado on 3/25. I called Morgan on Friday 3/26 to let her know what happened. On Monday 4/5 an ENTIRE set of new uniforms were delivered. We cannot express our gratitude enough for these wonderful people.

name: Brandon Parsons
text: Great service, great people, always making sure things are done correctly. Strongly suggest any company looking for a uniform supplier to give them a shot. Or anyone who is not satisfied with their current provider. These guys are the best at what they do.

name: Lara Little
text: Love our UniFirst service here in Anniston!  Our route guy is Matt Hendrix and he always makes sure he takes care of our employees uniforms and our supply needs.  I've worked with other uniform services in the past and can honestly say UniFirst has been by far the best service I've encountered.  Highly recommend!

name: John Schafer
text: Great service. We swapped from another company who will remain nameless. Got way better prices and the customer service is by far better.

name: Heather Caldwell
text: We have been using UniFirst for almost 10 years. They have great service and if there is an issue they try to resolve it quickly. Chris our delivery guy is really good at his job and has a great attitude and is fun to talk to

name: Cindy Webster
text: We work in Tuscaloosa, and Chris is our "guy". He is amazing. I know he will be here every Tuesday morning bright and early, always with a smile on his face. Always speaks to everyone he encounters. If I have ever had a problem with our bill or just a question about the uniforms he his always there to help. I really dont think I have ever seen him in an ill mood. Great Job Chris!!!!!!!

name: Landrey Robertson
text: We have tried every uniform company available to us in our area, we switched to Unifirst several months ago and have been nothing less than pleased! The customer service is 10/5 stars. They even made my three year old son a custom uniform to match the "big guys" here at work. If you have a question or concern you get to talk to YOUR team of Unifirst Reps and they personally make sure you are taken care of and satisfied with their service.

name: Jennifer Kiel
text: I love my WonderWink scrubs!  Hygienically cleaned and very reasonable.

name: Ben S
text: Our uniform company is unifirst they are a great company and our route man is Chris he is great and always friendly and polite would recommend this company for all uniform needs

name: Leigh Anne Sullivan
text: Our rep, Chris, is AWESOME! Skyland Auto & Tire in Tuscaloosa, AL receives excellent service & professionalism!

name: Jeff Shackelford
text:
It’s a fabulous company and I highly Reccomend - Unifirst sets the standard for how uniform
Rental should be

name: Flavio Udinese
text: excellent place, friendly people, price also good.

name: Adam Lesley
text: Chris is always on time and does a great job taking care of us! Would always recommend!

name: Brent Keith
text: Great friendly service from Kendall!

name: Devin Robison
text: Never get back a weeks worth of pants, sometimes I get 2 sometimes none and then the next I might get back 10

name: Melissa McClellen
text: UniFirst does an amazing job.  Justin is our guy with UniFirst and he gives us the best, quick but efficient service EVER.  I speak for our company when I say, we couldn't ask for better.

name: David Mccormick
text: I have been using UniFirst  for 14 years. Scott Langston has always taken care of any issues as soon as they happen. Great customer Service.

name: Brian Richey
text: Have been using UniFirst for over 20 years and would recommend to any company looking for a uniform program to use UniFirst.  Great management.

name: Derek Vicker
text: Very happy with the service

name: David Savage
text: We have had flawless service from Scott Langston. Happy with the customer service he provides. Uniforms made easy !

name: Jerry Sherrell
text: Scott Langston is just like part of the family... He is very knowledgeable and good at what he does. We are glad to have him.

name: JD Humphries
text: great service and resolves issues in a timely fashion

name: Beverly VanOrden
text: Sent in weeks worth of uniforms and now my other week an my husband and son only have one a piece.. So not a happy camper right now having to wash every night one set an the every morning the other cause one works days and other works nights for same company..

resp.text: Our apologies and thanks for bringing this to our attention. UniFirst has built its positive reputation by delivering excellence in customer service, and it appears one of our Locations may have fallen short of our expectations. Please call our centralized customer service team at (800) 794-2706, so we can open an official Service Request. This closed-loop, computerized system features an automated tracking and resolution process, so issues never fall through the cracks. We record all concerns for follow up within 24 hours, assign clear accountability for actions, maintain a history of requests and actions taken, and close the request only after your satisfaction is confirmed. We appreciate your business and never take it for granted. Thanks for your patience while we work to fix this.

name: Eat Sleep Disc. Com
text: We get our Logo Polo Shirts & Hats from Unifirst.  Great quality & price.  Would definitely buy from them again!

name: Allyson Hann
text: I work for Icemakers, Inc.  Deal with Justin every Monday and he is a very top notch employee.  Unifirst always has great customer service and their products are very well taken care of.  If we ever have an issue it is handled promptly.

name: Connie Lawson
text: Derrick does an awesome job taking care of all our uniform needs. Very pleased with the service!

name: Diane Clark
text: Scott does an outstanding job handling our uniform needs.

name: Pam Bullock
text: Justin Sargent is our delivery person at Evoqua Water Technologies in Irondale AL. He is courteous, well mannered, and all around nice person. We have no complaints on the uniform service as of yet.

name: Steve Simmons
text:
I was not looking to change Uniform company's, when the President of our company asked me to review prices and services.
After meeting with Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope from Unifirst, it was obvious I needed to make a change. I was able to save the company a considerable amount of money with increased services.
Jady Hubbard and Jamie Pope with Unifirst were always available with answers and made changing company's a smooth transition.

name: Steven Hughes
text: UniFirst has an amazing maintenance manager.

name: Rodney Dennis
text: Justin does a great at Clark memorials.

name: Joe Driver
text: I've been having a problem with my uniforms not fitting correctly ... All of them all the same size but do not all fit the same I've made one phone call and they came right out re-measured me and he getting me all new uniforms ... If you're looking for uniform company try try UniFirst before you spend time and money getting disappointed by the other companies

name: Derrick Marrisett
text: Great people Great place to work

name: Davida Holiday
text: Great supply spot, you should give them a try!

name: J C
text: Good selection but high prices on most items. However the have parts that you can’t get elsewhere. I need some aluminum angle and they beat Home Depot and Lowes prices by far.

name: Paul Streeter
text: Great helpful advice on my project, thanks

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out! ^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Jack Lloyd
text: Worst customer service.  Having people wait for hour to get service is unacceptable.

resp.text: Jack, we're sorry your Grainger experience wasn't satisfactory and would like to look into it further. Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience. We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and an opportunity for us to improve your experience. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Mac Thomas
text: They didn't have what I was looking for but they gave it a hellava try!

resp.text:
We're very happy we could help, Mac! Thank you for sharing this and thanks for choosing Grainger!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Richard Norwood
text: Store personnel is extremely helpful and friendly. Sometimes the parts I order aren’t immediately available but they can usually get it in next day. Prices are somewhat competitive but I understand I’m shopping at an industrial supply house.

resp.text:
Thanks for the nice review! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Mike Heard
text: I took a long list of tools I needed to purchase to the local store here in Huntsville, AL. The took the list and told me it would be a couple of days.  Here it is two weeks latter and I have heard nothing.  To top that, when I look to find their business phone number it is the corporate phone number and they cannot give you the store number.  I will not attempt to do business with them again.  If there was a zero star I would have selected it.  What poor customer service.

resp.text: Mike, we're sorry your Grainger branch experience wasn't satisfactory and would like to look into it further. Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience (including order number, account number, or any other information you feel may be helpful). We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and an opportunity for us to improve your experience. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Thomas McNutt
text: They were very helpful considering what is going on with the virus.

resp.text:
Thanks for the nice review, Thomas! Our goal is to always be the best partner possible to our customers. Glad to hear we were able to help you out!
^Paul, Grainger Social Team

name: Shane Gann
text: I need an electric motor, I called the store and got a call center, the lady knew nothing about parts, read her multiple parts numbers off the motor and the fan it was attached to. She finally said we are just going to have to call tech support.......really? I just need to know if the motor is in the store before I drive all the way over there.

name: Pure Bliss
text: They have the absolute best staff. They are friendly and professional. I got my pressure washer serviced. Mike was very knowledgeable. The turnaround time was very quick. This made me happy that my pressure washing business did not have to lose any money. This company is highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review. It's our pleasure to help you.

name: lectricdave
text: they have top of the line pressure washers and floor scrubbers for sale and rent

name: Kevin Baxter
text: Punctual, always there when you need them. And very convenient for our Business.

name: Tommy Morgan
text: Tyson is extremely knowlegable and polite. Chemicals are always readily available. Id give them 20 stars if i could

name: Nathan Martin
text:
Products needed are readily available
Staff was polite and courteous

name: Auburn Pressure Washing
text: Etowah chemicals has the best customer service.  James is the man!!!

name: William “Tennessee” Groover
text: Helpful...

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text:
We called to buy supplies for our business. The lady who answers phones has no clue about any of her products and when I asked repeatedly how could I buy from them or who do I need to speak to she would just reply "I don't know". And acted like I was bothering her day. I thought I was calling a business, one in which was in business to sale products.
You think the lady answering would have some knowledge on how to buy it. When she continuously repeated her lack of knowledge of her product I said, "that's ok, I guess we can come in and place a stocking order". She said, "oh no, were not walk in".
So I asked well is there someone I can talk to?
"Oh (some man). But he's busy."
She does not take my number so he can call back or give me a number to someone who had a better knowledge of their business and services.
Very unprofessional.

resp.text: Dwanda,  are you sure you have the right company.  We are a family run business and treat all call ins with the upmost respect.  I handle sales for the company and always get messages when people call to learn more about our products.  I apologize if this happened and would be available to chat and help you locate our products.  Kind Regards, Sean

name: David Blackburn
text: Great cleaning product and top notch customer service. We have been using them for years.

resp.text: Thank you, David for the kind words!

name: Ernest Bentley
text: Excellent products and great people!

name: Dalyn Tolbert
text: Great company to buy products from!!!

name: wes carlisle
text: I am extremely happy with a great service provided to me. I’ve been in business for a long time and I am And will be a satisfied client for as long as I can. Thanks

name: Lisa Craig
text: Having a very challenging time with this facility.  Can't get new employees uniforms in a timely fashion (over 6 weeks on order), can't get worn out uniforms replaced (they are pulled and take over 4 weeks to replace if replaced), have to manage in detail weekly and follow up, pricing was incorrect and took over 2 months to resolve, several several issues.  Have been working on/with the account for 6 months and issues continue to arise and are not resolved.  Lisa Craig, VAR LLC

name: Trey Edwards
text: Extremely disappointed in this company. Signed what we believed was a one-year contract back in 2015 when we owned two businesses. Don't own the bigger business anymore and they consistently don't deliver anywhere near our whole order every month, so I called and very politely asked to cancel. They called my wife the next day and informed us that we were locked into a contract until 2020 and that they would not only not cancel our contract, but that they would only give us the supplies they thought we lacked each month - NOT the amount we ordered. We have had to go to Sam's and Dollar General numerous times recently to get essential supplies that we've paid Cintas for and they have consistently not delivered. The one business we have left doesn't need anywhere close to the amount of stuff we originally signed up for, but apparently the fact that the main business doesn't exist anymore doesn't matter to Cintas. Horrible customer experience. We are currently examining the legal options available to us regarding cancellation of our contract with this pitiful company. There is no way we are paying $24 a month per hand soap that we don't even get.

name: Lara Armstrong
text: After repeated requests as well as phone calls where a supervisor was involved, my husband still does not have a uniform jacket that fits. It’s been four months since the first request. FOUR MONTHS. Maybe he will get a uniform jacket that fits when the middle of summer gets here, huh? I wouldn’t recommend Cintas uniform service to even my worst enemy.

name: SyNister Gaming
text: We never get all of our uniforms back. We have uniforms for exemployes hang in the back for months and they still try to charge us. I can never get straight answer out of them. When my contract is up will be finding a new place!

name: Justin Johnson
text: Nice place.

name: Elias Baltazar
text: Poor costumer service in the front office.

name: Mike Davis
text: Paved by jones brothers apshalt

name: S C
text: Good place to work if the owners would run things better and actually GIVE incentives on performance. That only seems to apply if you’re a salesman or in the family. Sad too cause I really enjoyed working there

name: Sithis Locks
text: It's fine I suppose, just should have 53' trailers delivering to them. To small for that.

name: Jeanette Perry
text: I love the customer service I gotten there today. Thumbs up

text:
Nancy and Friends,
Thank you so much for helping us out with our difficult lid problem.  You guys are a lifesaver.

text: It was okay a little hard to find a place cuz it's not hitting but they don't have a sign because people are nice by the yard is kind of small so it's okay

text: I have been put on the mape as a Vidal carpet cleaning company  in Birmingham Alabama  because  of the orders and the things I have be able  to purchase American osment is a company  that is a good fiber and is stimulating  the growth in Birmingham Alabama

resp.text: Thank you for your great review, Chan! We appreciate your business & support.

name: Dimitar Manov
text: Delivery.In 11.30am. ,out 12.30 pm .It is very narrow to go to the ramp.No overnight parking.

resp.text: Lillian, thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your business very much.
